name: Banzai Escape 2: Subterranean
description:
Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean is a sequel game based on the events of Banzai Escape 2 where the Draugr labs have been captured by SPECTRE. All of the sisters (Inchester, Imingter and Iekler) take in refugees to a location deep underground. In order to survive, they must defeat the Lanun occupying the underground dungeon networks along with other factions such as SPECTRE and others
You are an Elite Imingter agent with special access to roaming around underground networks to dispose any incoming threat.

Features:

1P or 2P


Single-player / Co-op mode to allow friend to play together.

Fun! Chaotic! Intense!


Player will always be encountering action moment with rogue and aggressive like of enemies while finishing your objectives

Customizable


Customizable costumes / skins. Lots varieties of options to choose to make your character looks prettier.

Random Generated Level


Random generate map segments to allow different path taken toward objectives area inside underground dungeon

RNG Arsenals


Random generate gun & powerups or loot-able for grinding. Lots of guns and about 56++ nano-plugin addon powerups skills with lots of random stats that can be obtainable.

..And Many more!

  • Random 15 / 20 level difficulty (5 easy, 5 Medium, 5 Hard, etc)
  • Random Mission / Objectives based system (Destroy, Capture, Kill, etc)


For tiny news / update / something
